channel.title: How do i make arrows work with certain bows
channel.description:
liiike ogre arrows with ogre bow, serched everywhere i cant find out how to make ogre arrows work, and make em work with ogre bow
ogre bow works. but i need rune arrows and thats NOT what i want, i want rune, and ogre to work :/ can i get some help?

item.title: How do i make arrows work with certain bows
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

uhh this is what it looks like after i added it

[code] public void CheckArrows()
{
for(int k = 880; k < 893; k++){

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == k){
HasArrows = true;
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2883 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] == 2866){
HasArrows = true;
}

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214){
HasArrows = true;
}
else {
HasArrows = false;
}

}
}
[/code]

Read full topic

lol sorry, once again i say, 1st time dealing with bows and such, and ah snap ur right, loli didnt even pay attention to the stoof i was looking to

and the code else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2883 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] == 2886){ HasArrows = true; } didnt work, compiled nice but no, i replaced the ID with the right arrow ID 2866
but its not working

item.title: How do i make arrows work with certain bows
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

yeh. sorry i forgot to mention it was 2866 not 2886, but anyway

my Cbow code looks like this:

[code] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows]

!= 0){
outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
outStream.writeWord(1688);
outStream.writeByte(playerArrows);
outStream.writeWord(playerEquipment[playerArrows]+1);
if (playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1 > 254) {
outStream.writeByte(255);
outStream.writeDWord(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1);
}
else {
outStream.writeByte(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1); //amount
}
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -= 1;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

could i copy it, and generate a code off this? i tried my code (without if, thanks but i rememberd i didnt need it :P, and fixed my arrow ID ) and didnt work,

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make arrows work with certain bows
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2883 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] == 2886){ HasArrows = true; }

All he has to do is add that after what he already has there that would make it so that you can only use ogre arrows with ogre comp bow

item.title: How do i make arrows work with certain bows
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:4, topic:127345”]yeh ive been staring at those words in my client for the past 15 minuts thinking of the code lol
1st time messing with bows im afraid :S

i thought up a random code for it,

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 2883 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 2886){ HasArrows = true; } else if { HasArrows = false; }

bear with me i thought that up from nowhere borrowing a copy paste cuz i was to lazy to type
u think the code would work?[/quote]
it’s more like

    if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2883 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] <= 2886) hasArrows = true; 
    else hasArrows = false;

l2javaplzthx

Read full topic
